description.value:
Fire, Necrotic

Aura 2

Each enemy that enters or starts its turn within the aura chooses either to take 15 damage (roll 1d6: 1-3 fire, 4-6 necrotic) or to slide 2 squares and be immobilized until the start of its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage plus 1d8 + 6 fire damage plus 1d8 + 6 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 2d10+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The abyssal elder gold dragon makes two claw attacks

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When the abyssal elder gold dragon is hit by a creature adjacent to it, at-will

+28 vs Fortitude; the target is pushed 4 squares and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fear

Minor, Recharge

Ranged 10

+28 vs Fortitude; 1d8+5 damage, and the abyssal elder gold dragon slides the target 4 squares; if the target is bloodied, it is slowed and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both). This ongoing damage stacks with other untyped ongoing damage, up to a maximum of 15.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

+26 vs Reflex; 1d8+6 fire damage plus 1d8 + 6 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the abyssal elder gold dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Cold, Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +26 vs Will; 2d10+6 cold damage, and the target is dazed and restrained until the end of the abyssal elder gold dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).
The abyssal elder gold dragon can make one saving throw at the start of its turn against an effect a save can end.

system.biography:
HP 888; Bloodied 444 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 15 fire, 15 variable (2/encounter) 		Init +18 | AP 2 | Save +5; see also chaos’s freedom
AC 38Fort 38Ref 35Will 36
Speed 8, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+21)
Con 22 (+18)		Dex 22 (+18)
Int 20 (+17)		Wis 20 (+17)
Cha 25 (+19)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +22, Insight +22Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 32
